sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
An epitaphe vpon the death [of] Mayster Iohn Viron preacher Awdelay, John, fl. 1559-1577.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
By Iohn Awdely, dwellyng in lytle Britayne streete by great Saint Bartelmewes, Imprinted at London : [1563?]
Signed: Quod Iohn Awdelie. Verse - "Thou soule whych on Christes brest, doest rest as Iohn loued,". Véron died in 1563. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery. Mutilated, with loss of part of border and "of" in title.
=======
An epitaphe vpon the death [of] Mayster Iohn Viron preacher Awdelay, John, fl. 1559-1577.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
By Iohn Awdely, dwellyng in lytle Britayne streete by great Saint Bartelmewes, Imprinted at London : [1563?]
Signed: Quod Iohn Awdelie. Verse - "Thou soule whych on Christes brest, doest rest as Iohn loued,". Véron died in 1563. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery. Mutilated, with loss of part of border and "of" in title.
Iohn Awdely
great Saint Bartelmewes
lytle Britayne streete
